title: Hans Beer-Pot his inuisible comedie, of see me, and see me not Actedin the Low Countries, by an honest company of health-drinkers.
author: Belchier, Dabridgcourt, 1580?-1621.
publisher: Imprinted by Bernard Alsop, and are to be solde at his house by Saint Annes Church neere Aldersgate,
notes: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Running title reads: See mee, and see me not.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
